rows.label: tlk70000067_04_msg0001
rows.name:
This place looks quite
showy since Mirei arrived.

rows.label: tlk70000067_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Nearly say things that I ought
not to when I see this stuff...

rows.label: tlk70000067_04_msg0003
rows.name:
But time to put the past behind
me and look to the future.

rows.label: tlk70000067_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Might cause me a bit of grief,
but I'd rather have a quiet
life here with Mirei.
